document_data.caption: A map showing Bridge Street in southern Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Bridge Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Bridge Street''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in southern Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]], Bridge Street was a small road in the eastern Foreign Quarter that connected [[the Throat (road)|the Throat]] with the [[Tesh Bridge]]. [[Zhent Avenue]] connected with Bridge Street from the west.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The [[Tesh Inn]]
* [[Zhentilar]] guardpost
* The [[Hall of Rulership]]
* [[The Crypts]]
* [[Custom House]]
